name: Copyright Editor – Easy
author: Pham Huu Thanh

sections.description:
Easily edit the footer copyright with the Copyright Editor plugin. You can remove the footer copyright or edit it to your liking. Free forever plugin for wordpress website!!

What functions are available

  1. Remove footer copyrights
  2. Edit copyright content in the footer
sections.installation:
1. Upload folder \’copyright-editor-easy-pht\’ v√†o wp-content/plugins
  2. Activate the plugin in the area Plugins -> Installed Plugins
  3. Go to the Copyright Editor on the left side of the Menu to install.
sections.faq:
Does the plugin upgrade to the paid version and require users to pay?

The plugin is completely free, we will not upgrade to any paid version. However, users can support the group through the Donate function.

Does the plugin install malicious code or hidden links?

The plugin complies with WordPress.org’s rules and has been moderated. We are committed not to use plugins for the purpose of inserting links that are harmful to your website. If it detects an unnecessary link please respond to us to be removed.
